ingredients: 2 tbsp tomato paste (you can cheat with 2 tbsp of ketchup)
2 large potatoes, cut in a small dice (optional. Chana Masala usually doesn't have potatoes, but I love how wonderfully tender they cook up in this recipe in the slow cooker)
1 tbsp chana masala powder (can sub with garam masala)
¼ cup chopped coriander for garnish
